title: Avananri Or
sahitya:
avananri Or aNuvum ashaiyAdaDi sakhiyE amaidiyE parama sukhamE


anupallavi

  navamAna viLaiyATTAl evaninda uyirulaga nAyakanAi gati mOKSa dAyakanAi viLanguvAn


caraNam    vIratti Arambha sUrattai vIN ahankArattai pEshAdu vEdAgamangaLin
sAranAm shuddha OmkAranAm avan mIdu bhAratti vaittenda nErattilum tudi shei
